channel.title: Usage Monitoring on Agilebase docs
channel.description: Recent content in Usage Monitoring on Agilebase docs

item.title: Reporting
item.description: Log data reporting provides a rich view of system usage. Enhanced audit trail For organisations who have activated the enhanced audit trail, all logs are stored in user-accessible tables which are just like any other tables in the system, the only difference being the data is read only. This means an administrator can use the full power of the built in Agilebase reporting features, to create views, add calculations, charts etc.
